img_above_text:
# Consumable Items
Consumable Items are found throughout Black Myth: Wukong's chapters. These come in the form of additional drinks, which you can consume on the fly, providing a host of different buffs and stat boosts. From removing elemental effects, boosting resistance, supercharging your health, or granting bonus damage, each one can change the tide of a fight or boss battle, provided you use it at the right time.
Most of these consumables can also be crafted from the Shrine once you reach the Shen Monkey Vendor in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain and the end of Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge and meet Xu Dog. Our walkthrough has a full breakdown of each of those areas.
## Black Myth: Wukong Consumables Locations
Below, you can find a list of each of the consumable items scattered throughout the game, as well as their effects. Each item can be found in multiple places, across several chapters so keep an eye out.
Image | Consumable | Rarity | Effect | Location | Crafting Ingredients Required | Collected
---|---|---|---|---|---|---

img_summary: The image depicts the Incense Trail Talisman, a consumable item from the game Black Myth: Wukong. This talisman is part of the game's consumables, which players can use to gain various buffs and stat boosts during gameplay. The image is positioned at the beginning of the section titled "Black Myth: Wukong Consumables Locations" in the document "Consumable Items." The talisman, like other consumables in the game, can be crafted at specific locations once certain conditions are met, enhancing the player's ability to navigate challenges and battles effectively.
